## Trove.adjust() method

Calculate the result of an [adjustTrove()](./stablecoin-lib-base.transactableprotocol.adjusttrove.md) transaction on this Trove.

**Signature:**

```typescript
adjust(params: TroveAdjustmentParams<Decimalish>, borrowingRate?: Decimalish): Trove;
```
